description: A small, humanoid figure wreathed in flickering flames, the Scorchling Apprentice is a fledgling fire elemental learning to harness its fiery abilities. Often found in the service of more powerful fire elementals or sorcerers, it struggles to control its intense heat, resulting in unpredictable outbursts of flame.

traits.name: Flame Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the Scorchling Apprentice or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet takes 1d4 fire damage.

traits.name: Wild Flames
traits.description: Whenever the Scorchling Apprentice casts a fire-based spell, there is a 20% chance it triggers a burst of uncontrolled flames, causing 1d6 fire damage to all creatures within 10 feet, including the Scorchling Apprentice.

actions.name: Fire Bolt
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 fire damage.

actions.name: Flame Wave (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Scorchling Apprentice emits a wave of flame in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
